name: THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99
description:
well, this is my second professional game. fortunately or unfortunately made completely alone again AND again by just one person a classic indie game . Tells a Story ... A little robot gains the opportunity from the Creator of God's Multiverse to experience human life led by Francis Bacon and Zyzz . will experience all the pros and cons of your lifetime on Earth . Legendary and unforgettable adventures that pay homage to the extraordinary passage of Francis Bacon and Zyzz on planet earth. Helping the little robot to live here on Earth .



MANY FEATURES THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99 DOCUMENTAL MAIN MENU :


3 AMAZING CHARACTERS TO CHOOSE THEM AS THE GENIUSES FRANCIS BACON, ZYZZ AND LITTLE ROBOT !!!


20 DIFFERENT TYPE OF ENEMIES WITH DIFFERENT STYLES AND DIFFERENT LEVELS OF POWER " HARDER " .


4 BIG BOSSESS ASAN ANTICHRIST ASHOKA'S HELL, ÁTILA o Huno, PRINCESS AND LION'S ALPHA.

TOGGLE CAMERAS VIEWS FIRSTPERSONSHOOTER, THIRDPERSONCLOSER, TOPDOWN VIEW AND PRESS F TO CHANGE THE TYPE OF VIEWS .

11 DIFFERENT AMAZING DARKER AND LIGHTER LEVELS( HurricaneS) COSMOS POSSIBLE OPEN WORLDS .

THIS PROJECT CALLED THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99 WAS MADE IN UNREAL ENGINE 4 YET .
USING C++ CODETIME .


STYLE OF PLAY : RPG STRATEGY GAMES .. AS DARKSOULS .... HARDER AGAIN HAHAHA !!!


" INSPIRED BY the Gnome is TOO AWARE (WAYNERADIOTV) OF COURSE " LESSER AWARENESS " AND GENIUS VS ANTICHRIST 1 BUT EASIER !!! "
